title: Lol Launcher don't update (update 5.24)
body: I have good internet but when I start my launcher than my download speed goes up for a while and then it immediately goes to zero pleas help me

replies.body: I have the same issue, but I let it run and it went back up to 1.2MBps, but it periodically shuts down, like randomly while I'm using different programs on my PC I go back onto my homescreen and then the launcher has shut down, and I still have 1.2GB of this to put up with...

Hey Celyex,

The best thing to do is to let the patcher run. There are points in the patching process in which files are being moved and no files are being downloaded. Were you able to complete your patching process?
